GK19uddkokpu:0: pūrvabhāgaḥ saudhe tuṅge saha dayitayā ko 'pi saṅkrīḍamānaḥ prāpa svāpaṃ paramapuruṣaḥ śeṣabhoge śriyeva /
GK19uddkokpu:1_0: citrā daivī gatiriyamasau śailajāmaṇḍitāyāṃ kāñcyāṃ kampātaṭabhuvi tayānanvito budhyate sma tvāmāninyuḥ subhaga śayitaṃ līlayā
GK19uddkokpu:1_1: nīlakeśyo draṣṭuṃ devaṃ varuṇapurataḥ sampatantyo vimānaiḥ
GK19uddkokpu:2_0: atrāmuñcannapi bhagavatīkiṅkaroktyā saśaṅkāḥ śuśrāvetthaṃ sa punaravapussaṅgrahāṃ vyomni vāṇīm kṣetre cāsmin sakalavipadāṃ
GK19uddkokpu:2_1: bhañjane pañca māsān āsīthāścet priyajanaviyogārtirūrdhvaṃ na te syāt /
GK19uddkokpu:3_0: ākarṇyemāṃ punariti tathā saiṣa cakre nivāsaṃ kleśo bhūyānapi bahumataḥ ślāghyate cedudarkaḥ tatra dvitrān priyasahacarīviprayogātidīrghān
GK19uddkokpu:4: caitrārambhe samuditamadhuśrīkaṭākṣābhirāmaṃ cūtāṅkūrāsvadanarasikaṃ kokilaṃ sandadarśa // taṃ kūjantaṃ kalamadhurayā pañcamasvānabhaṅgyā kāntālāpasmaraṇavivaśaḥ kiñcidārādupetya /
GK19uddkokpu:5_0: datvā netrāñjalipuṭabhṛtairarghyamaśrupravāhair jātāśvāsaḥ sphuṭamiti girā śrāvyayā sandideśa atrāyāhi priyasakha nanu svāgataṃ
GK19uddkokpu:6_0: tvatsamparkaṃ subhaga niyataṃ kāṅkṣate 'sau vilolā lolambākṣī calakisalayairāhvayantī sarāgā antastoṣaṃ mama vitanuṣe hanta
GK19uddkokpu:7_0: kūjāvyājāddhitamupadiśan kokilāvyājabandho kāntaiḥ sākaṃ nanu ghaṭayase kāminīrmānabhājaḥ vācālaṃ mā parabhṛta kṛthā māṃ
GK19uddkokpu:7_1: priyāviprayuktaṃ prāyaḥ prāptaṃ praṇayavacanaṃ tvādṛśe mādṛśānām
GK19uddkokpu:8_0: kiñcillīnāṃ kisalayapuṭe kokilāmākulātmā tvaṃ cāpaśyan bata virahiṇāṃ yena jānāsi tāpam // yāvatkālaṃ mahitapatagādhīśa kārye
GK19uddkokpu:8_1: niyoktuṃ saṅkocaṃ me vrajati rasanā sandidikṣormṛgākṣyāḥ
GK19uddkokpu:9_0: tāvatkālaṃ tava ca hṛdayaṃ tāntimetīti śaṅke dīnāpannapraṇayaghaṭane dīrghasūtretarasya // sandeśaṃ me naya khagapate sādhaya
GK19uddkokpu:9_1: bhrātṛkṛtyaṃ santāpārtāṃ suvacana samāśvāsaya preyasīṃ me /
GK19uddkokpu:10_0: kāntodantaḥ suhṛdupanato viprayogārditānāṃ prāyaḥ strīṇāṃ bhavati kimapi prāṇasandhāraṇāya gantavyaste tridivavijayī maṅgalāgreṇa
GK19uddkokpu:10_1: deśaḥ prāptaḥ khyātiṃ vihitatapasaḥ prāgjayantasya nāmnā /
GK19uddkokpu:11: pāre cūrṇyāḥ parisarasamāsīnagovindavakṣo- lakṣmīvīkṣāvivalanasudhāśītalaḥ keraleṣu // Kok_1.11
GK19uddkokpu:12: tatra drakṣyasyakhilamahilāmaulimālāyamānāṃ bālāmenāṃ niyatamadhunā madviyogena dīnām /
GK19uddkokpu:13: kalyāṇī sā kanakakadalīkandalīkomalāṅgī kandarpāgniṃ kathamiva kukūlāgnikalpaṃ saheta // Kok_1.12
GK19uddkokpu:14: adhvānaṃ te hitamupadiśāmyaśrameṇaiva gantuṃ snigdhacchāyaistarubhirabhitaḥ śāntagharmapracāram
GK19uddkokpu:15_0: saṃskartāsi dhruvamupagato yatra patrīndra teṣām uddāmānāmapi navanavodyānalīlāyitānām // śrīkāmākṣyā vinatamamarairutsavaṃ
GK19uddkokpu:16: tvatsaṃllāpaśravaṇataralāḥ paścimāmbhodhivelā- paryantaṃ te varuṇanagarīmañjuvācaḥ sahāyāḥ ākarṣantaḥ pratinavalatāpuṣpagandhopahārān āsiñcantaḥ saraṇimabhitaḥ śītalaiḥ śīthuleśaiḥ
GK19uddkokpu:17_0: bhṛṅgīnādairmadhuramadhuraṃ vyāharanto valante kampākūlopavanapavanā bandhavaste 'nukūlāḥ vandasvārāt priyasakha punardarśanāyātra
GK19uddkokpu:18_0: ādhatte yat kanakavalabhīnīḍalīnaiḥ kapotair adyāpyambhoruhabhavamakhālagnadhūmābhiśaṅkām pīṭheṣvaṣṭādaśasu mahitaṃ kāmapīṭhaṃ
GK19uddkokpu:18_1: bhajethāḥ pārekampaṃ svayamiha parā devatā sannidhatte
GK19uddkokpu:19_0: sabhrūcāpaṃ nayanajaladaṃ prāpya yasyāḥ kṛpāpaṃ tuṇḍīrakṣmā sulabhakavitāsasyavṛddhiḥ samindhe uḍḍīyāsmād bakulasarasāt sa
GK19uddkokpu:20_0: mūle yasya prakṛtisubhage muktakailāsalobho devaḥ sākṣādvasati valayāṅkāhvayaścandracūḍaḥ dṛṣṭvā śambhuṃ gaganasaraṇāvujjihāne
GK19uddkokpu:21_0: utthāsyanti bhramarataruṇāḥ siktadehā marandair udyānaśrīprahitasajalāpāṅgabhaṅgānukārāḥ // spaṣṭālakṣyastvayi pika samālambamāne
GK19uddkokpu:22: tatsaundaryāpahṛtahṛdayo mā vilambasva gantuṃ bandhutrāṇād bahumatipadaṃ nāparaṃ tvadvidhānām āśāṃ pāśāyudhatilakitāmāśrayannāttavegaḥ kūlonmīlatkramukakuhalīcāmarāndolitormim /
GK19uddkokpu:23_0: drakṣyasyagre vikacakamalodgandhimādhvīkapānāt kṣībakṣībabhramarataruṇīsevitāṃ kṣīrasindhum pakṣodyautaiḥ pataga purajitkandharākāṇḍanīlair
GK19uddkokpu:24: suvyaktaṃ te gamanasaraṇiḥ sūtrayedūrdhvamasyāḥ sindhusnehopagatayamunāveṇivīthīvilāsam // cūte cūte kusumakalikāṃ tvāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sametaṃ bālāśokāhananamaruṇairaṅghribhistanvatīnām
GK19uddkokpu:25_0: tanvaṅgīnāṃ śravaṇasubhagairnūpurāṇāṃ virāvair vācālāḥ syurniyatamabhitaḥ kūlamārāmasīmāḥ snātottīrṇāḥ sajalakaṇikāsundarorojakumbhāḥ
GK19uddkokpu:26_0: tīre tasyā dramiḍasudṛśo darśanīyā vilokya prāyo bhāvī kṣaṇamiva sakhe gacchataste vilambaḥ dhūmastomaiḥ savanajanitairdhūsaropāntavṛkṣāḥ
GK19uddkokpu:27_0: ruddhābhogā dvijavaravidhisnānapūtaistaṭākair draṣṭavyāste tadanu saritaṃ dakṣiṇenāgrahārāḥ sā vaidagdhī śrutiṣu sa punaḥ
GK19uddkokpu:28_0: tatratyānāṃ kimiha bahunā sarvametat paṭhantaḥ śṛṅge śṛṅge gṛhaviṭapināṃ spaṣṭayiṣyanti kīrāḥ tānullaṅghya smitakuvalayasnigdhamutkandharāṇāṃ
GK19uddkokpu:29_0: vilvakṣetraṃ viśa paśupaterveśma nīvāsamīrair dhūtālindadhvajapaṭaśikhairnūnamāhūyamānaḥ // kāmaḥ svāmī kila śalabhatāmāpa
GK19uddkokpu:29_1: netrasphuliṅge mā mā bhaiṣīriti bhavabhido darśanāccandramauleḥ
GK19uddkokpu:30_0: śyāmā varṇe vacasi madhurā cañcalā dṛgvilāse vāmotsaṅge lasati karuṇā kāpi kāmaṃ duhānā // pakṣisvānaiḥ paṭumadakalaiḥ svāgatāni
GK19uddkokpu:31: tatrārāmāḥ surabhisacivaṃ tvāṃ sakhe mānayeyus tulyaprītirbhavati hi jano rājavadrājamitre kāle tasmin karadhṛtagalannīvayo vārakāntāḥ sambhogānte nibiḍalatikāmandirebhyaścalantyaḥ
GK19uddkokpu:32_0: vītasvedāstava viharataḥ pakṣapālīsamīrair ākhinnabhrūvalanamalasairarcayiṣyantyapāṅgaiḥ // bhūyo gacchan janapadamimaṃ sa
GK19uddkokpu:33: kāntārāṇi prasavaśayanaiśchinnaguñjākalāpaiḥ kuñje kuñje kathitaśabaradvandvalīlāyitāni // tatratyāstvāṃ kusumakalikāśīthudhārāṃ vamanto nīrandhreṣu skhalitagatayo nirjharīśīkareṣu
GK19uddkokpu:35: cumban bimbādharamiva navaṃ pallavaṃ śīthugarbhaṃ prāptāśleṣaḥ stana iva nave korake kāmacārī
GK19uddkokpu:36_0: bhoktāsi tvaṃ kamapi samayaṃ tatra mākandavallīḥ kāntārāge sati vikasite kaḥ pumāṃstyaktumīṣṭe daṣṭvā cañcvā kanakakapiśā
GK19uddkokpu:37: vidyutvantaṃ navajaladharaṃ manyamānāḥ salīlaṃ nartiṣyanti priyasakha calatpiñchabhārā mayūrāḥ dṛśyā dūre tadanu laharīsampatadrājahaṃsā sā kāverī madajalajharī sahyadantāvalasya /
GK19uddkokpu:38: meghaśyāmo bhujagaśayano medinīhārayaṣṭer madhye yasyā marataka iva prekṣyate raṅganāthaḥ puṇyānasyāstaṭabhuvi purīkharvaṭagrāmaruddhān udyānadruprasavasurabhīn hosalān gāhamānaḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:39: lakṣmīnārāyaṇapuramiti khyātamantarmurāreḥ prāpyāvāsaṃ bhava pikapate pāvanānāṃ purogaḥ // tatratyānāṃ ruciracikuranyastasaugandhikānāṃ tāruṇyoṣmāñcitakucataṭīvitruṭatkañcukānām /
GK19uddkokpu:40_0: nāsāmuktābharaṇakiraṇonmiśramandasmitānāṃ veśastrīṇāṃ bhavati vivaśo vibhramairdarpako 'pi tāścenmānagrathitahṛdayāḥ sannatān
GK19uddkokpu:40_1: nādri yeran kāntāḥ kāntān parabhṛta kuhūkāramekaṃ vimuñca
GK19uddkokpu:42_0: kṣatradhvaṃsāt svayamuparato viprasātkṛtya kṛtsnaṃ pṛthvīcakraṃ bhṛgukulapatiryattaṭe sannidhatte tvañcaddhūmān davahutabhujo
GK19uddkokpu:43_0: dṛṣṭvā dūrādanuminutamāmuṣṇaśītaiḥ samīraiḥ sandigdhāyāṃ vipadi sahasāvṛttirārtiṃ hi sūte dṛṣṭvā tatrāmalakadharaṇīmandiraṃ
GK19uddkokpu:44: kūle 'mbhodheḥ kramukakalilāṃ keralakṣoṇimagre paśya sphītāṃ bhṛgusutabhujāvikramopakramaṃ yā // Kok_1.41 //
GK19uddkokpu:45: prāptavyaste yadi kṛtamaho vāṅmayītīravāsī devo dakṣādhvaravimathanoḍḍāmaraścandracūḍaḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:46_0: āste śātatriśikhaśikhayā dārukaṃ jaghnuṣī sā yasyādūre mṛgapatiśirastasthuṣī bhadrakālī // siktaḥ svacchairjharajalakaṇaistaṃ
GK19uddkokpu:47_0: dhvāṅkṣabhrāntyā yadi parijanāstvāṃ samutsārayeran kūjāṃ kiñcit kuru nanu girā vyajyate sannasaṃśca itthaṃ bhaktyā puramathanamārādhya
GK19uddkokpu:47_1: labdhaprasādaḥ kṛṣṭaḥ kṛṣṭaḥ pathi pathi sakhe keralīnāṃ kaṭākṣaiḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:48_0: uccaiḥ saudhairuḍugaṇagatīrūrdhvamutsārayantīṃ phullārāmāṃ praviśa puralīkṣmābhṛtāṃ rājadhānīm yeṣāṃ vaṃśe samajani hariścandranāmā
GK19uddkokpu:48_1: narendraḥ pratyāpattiḥ pataga yadupajñaṃ ca kaumārilānām
GK19uddkokpu:49_0: yuddhe yeṣāmahitahataye caṇḍikā sannidhatte teṣāmeṣāṃ stutiṣu na bhavet kasya vaktraṃ pavitram putrasyāsau priyasakha iti
GK19uddkokpu:49_1: prītigarbhaiḥ kaṭākṣair dṛṣṭastasyāṃ puri viharatā rukmiṇīvallabhena
GK19uddkokpu:50: tasyaivāgre sadayamabalālūnasūnapravāle bālodyāne kvacana viharan mārgakhedaṃ vijahyāḥ // kelīyānakvaṇitaraśanā komalābhyāṃ padābhyām ālīhastārpitakaratalā tatra cedāgatā syāt /
GK19uddkokpu:51_0: svātī nāma kṣitipatisutā sevituṃ devamasyāḥ svairālāpaistava pika girāṃ kāpi śikṣā bhavitrī tāmāyāntīṃ stanabharaparitrastabhugnāvalagnāṃ
GK19uddkokpu:52_0: kiñciccañcūkalitakalikāśīthubhāreṇa siñceś cañcaccillīcalanasubhagān lapsyase 'syāḥ kaṭākṣān kañcitkālaṃ dhutakisalayācchādanaṃ
GK19uddkokpu:53_0: yātrodyukte subhaga bhavati vyañjayedātmasādaṃ muktāścyotanmadhurasamiṣānmuñcatī bāṣpaleśam digyātavyā yadapi bhavato dakṣiṇā
GK19uddkokpu:53_1: rakṣaṇārthaṃ matprāṇānāṃ punarapi sakhe paścimāmeva yāyāḥ
GK19uddkokpu:54_0: dhūtārāmaṃ mukuṭataṭinīmārutaistatra śambhoḥ sampadgrāmaṃ yadi na bhajase janmanā kiṃ bhṛtena saudhaistuṅgairhasadiva sudhākṣālitai
GK19uddkokpu:54_1: rājatādriṃ tejorāśeḥ praviśa bhavanaṃ dhūrjaṭerūrjitaṃ tat /
GK19uddkokpu:55_0: pārśve pārśve paricitanamaskārajātaśramāṇāṃ kṣmādevānāṃ kṣaṇamanubhavaṃstālavṛntasya līlām utkīrṇānāṃ kanakavalabhīṣūdgato
GK19uddkokpu:56: kaṇṭhacchāyā pratiphalati kiṃ bharturityadriputryā nidhyātaḥ san kutukanibhṛtairnetrapātaiḥ pavitraiḥ // Kok_1.52 //
GK19uddkokpu:58: gāyantīnāṃ kvacidapi sakhe komalān kinnarīṇāṃ vīṇārāvānupaśṛṇu bhavatkūjitenāviśiṣṭān // Kok_1.53
GK19uddkokpu:59: divyaiśvaryaṃ diśasi bhajatāṃ vartase bhikṣamāṇo gaurīmaṅke vahasi bhasitaṃ pañcabāṇaṃ cakartha
GK19uddkokpu:60_0: kṛtsnaṃ vyāpya sphurasi bhuvanaṃ mṛgyase cāgamāntaiḥ kaste tattvaṃ prabhavati paricchettumāścaryasindho itthaṃ stutvā bahirupavanopāntamākandaśṛṅge
GK19uddkokpu:61: drakṣyasyanvaksaphalanayanaṃ tāṇḍavānīndumauler lāsyakrīḍālalitagirijāpāṅgasambhāvitāni // tasmin kāle balimahajuṣāṃ vāravāmālakānāṃ sthālīcakre stanataṭadhṛte sānurāge hṛdīva /
GK19uddkokpu:62_0: bimbavyājādviśati bhavati syādamuṣyeti śaṅke spaṣṭāṅkasya kṣaṇamudayagasyendubimbasya lakṣmīḥ viṣvakkīrṇairiva paśupateḥ
GK19uddkokpu:63_0: viśrāntaḥ san kvacana vipule vṛkṣaśākhākuṭumbe tāṃ tatraiva kṣapaya rajanīṃ śrāntavisrastapakṣaḥ velāvātāścaramajaladhervīcimāndolayantaḥ
GK19uddkokpu:64_0: svedāṅkūrān suratajanitān subhruvāṃ corayantaḥ seviṣyante niśi parabhṛta tvāṃ sukhena prasuptam prāptonmeṣe prathamaśikhariprasthadāvāgnikalpe
GK19uddkokpu:65: prasthātuṃ tvaṃ punarapi sakhe prakramethāḥ prabhāte svātmakleśaḥ suhṛdupakṛtau tvādṛśānāṃ sukhāya // Kok_1.59 //
GK19uddkokpu:66: padmopāntāduṣasi ramaṇe prāpnuvatyeva pārśvaṃ madhye mārajvaraparavaśāṃ vīkṣamāṇo rathāṅgīm
GK19uddkokpu:67: dūraṃ prāpte mayi vidhivaśāddūyamānāṃ sakhīṃ te smāraṃ smāraṃ dviguṇagamanotsāha eva dhruvaṃ syāḥ // Kok_1.60 //
GK19uddkokpu:68: dṛṣṭvā devaṃ parisarajuṣaṃ śambare bālakṛṣṇaṃ lopāmudrāsakhatilakitaṃ diṅmukhaṃ bhūṣayiṣyan
GK19uddkokpu:69_0: kolānelāvanasurabhilān yāhi yatra prathante velātītaprathitavacasaḥ śaṅkarādyāḥ kavīndrāḥ unmajjadbhiḥ punariva javāt pakṣavadbhirgirīndrair
GK19uddkokpu:70_0: lakṣmījāneḥ śayanasadanaṃ puṣpavāṭaṃ purāreḥ pākasthānaṃ nikhilamarutāṃ paśya vārānnidhānam muktājālairdhavalapulinaṃ vīcimālāvikīrṇaiḥ
GK19uddkokpu:71_0: deśāddeśaṃ vrajasi kutukottānamugdhānanānāṃ vāmākṣīṇāṃ nayanaculakaiḥ sādaraṃ pīyamānaḥ // kuryāt prītiṃ tava nayanayoḥ kukkuṭakroḍanāma
GK19uddkokpu:72_0: yaddorvīryadraḍhimakaradībhūtarājanyavīrāḥ śūrāgraṇyaḥ śikharijaladhisvāminaḥ pālayanti // gehe gehe navanavasudhākṣālitaṃ
GK19uddkokpu:72_1: yatra saudhaṃ saudhe saudhe surabhikusumaiḥ kalpitaṃ kelitalpam
GK19uddkokpu:73_0: talpe talpe rasaparavaśaṃ kāminīkāntayugmaṃ yugme yugme sa khalu viharan viśvavīro manobhūḥ vyarthaṃ karṇe navakuvalayaṃ
GK19uddkokpu:73_1: vidyamāne kaṭākṣe bhāro hāraḥ stanakalaśayorbhāsure mandahāse
GK19uddkokpu:74: yatra snigdheṣvapi kacabhareṣveṇaśābekṣaṇānāṃ mādyadbhṛṅge sati parimale maṅgalāya prasūnam yatra jñātvā kṛtanilayanāmindirāmātmakanyāṃ manye snehākulitahṛdayo vāhinīnāṃ vivoḍhā /
GK19uddkokpu:75_0: tattaddvīpāntaraśatasamānītaratnaughapūrṇaṃ naukājālaṃ muhurupaharan vīcibhiḥ śliṣyatīva // tatsaudhāgreṣvaruṇadṛṣadāṃ sāndrasindūrakalpaṃ
GK19uddkokpu:76_0: dṛṣṭvā vātāyanavinihitairlocanābjaistaruṇyo valgadvakṣoruhamupacitairhastatālairhaseyuḥ // kṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭiṃ kathamapi tataḥ
GK19uddkokpu:76_1: kautukānāṃ nidānād uḍḍīyethāḥ pathi viṭapināṃ puṣpamādhvīṃ lihānaḥ
GK19uddkokpu:77_0: hāraṃ hāraṃ madanapṛtanākāhalaiḥ kaṇṭhanādair utkaṇṭhānāṃ janapadamṛgīlocanānāṃ manāṃsi // brahmābhyāsapraśamitakalīn prāpya
GK19uddkokpu:77_1: dīprān prakāśān śvetāraṇyaṃ vraja bahumataṃ dhāma mṛtyuñjayasya
GK19uddkokpu:78_0: dṛṣṭvā dūre sakṛdapi janā yanna paśyantyavaśyaṃ mṛtyorvaktraṃ niṭilaghaṭitabhrūkuṭīkaṃ kadācit sevyaṃ śambhoraruṇamurasastāḍanāddaṇdapāṇeḥ
GK19uddkokpu:79_0: yenākrānte sati giripatau loṣṭamānāsyacakraś cakrandādhaḥkṛtabhujavano rakṣasāṃ cakravartī pārśve yasya pravahati nilā nāma
GK19uddkokpu:80_0: nāvākṣetrapraṇayi ramayākrāntadormadhyamāste kūle yasyāḥ kuvalayadalaśyāmalaṃ dhāma kiñcit sākaṃ kāntairmilati lalitaṃ keralīnāṃ
GK19uddkokpu:81: pāyaṃ pāyaṃ mukhaparimalaṃ mohanaṃ yatra mattāḥ prāyo 'dyāpi
GK19uddkokpu:83: śaivālaughacchuritakamalā saikatasraṃsihaṃsā nītā kārśyaṃ tapanakiraṇairvāsareṣveṣu sindhuḥ

GK19uddkokpu:173_0: tādṛkpremṇaściravirahiṇaḥ prāṇanāthasya vāṇī seyaṃ mattaḥ śravaṇasarasā śrūyatāṃ śrāvyabandhā kalyāṇāṅgi priyasahacarīṃ tvāmanāsādayadbhir
GK19uddkokpu:174_0: dhanyaṃ cetaḥ punaridamahorātramanyānapekṣaṃ tvayyāmagnaṃ bata nanu pṛthagbhāgyamapyekajānām mādyadbhṛṅgaiḥ kumudapavanaistarjyamānasya
GK19uddkokpu:174_1: ghorair ātaṅkākhye sarasi luṭhato hā niśīthe niśīthe
GK19uddkokpu:175_0: nidrāmūke jagati rudati śvāsacintājuṣo me saṅkrandantaścaṭulanayane cakravākāḥ sahāyāḥ // mohādvaitaṃ viharati dhṛtirlīyate
GK19uddkokpu:175_1: jāḍyamīne bhātyunmādo bhramati matirityādi so 'haṃ na vedmi
GK19uddkokpu:176_0: bāṇaṃ muñcan parisaracaro na svapan nāpi khādan kṛtsnaṃ jānātyalasagamane kevalaṃ pañcabāṇaḥ kāle cāsmin kanadalibhṛtaḥ kampitāgrapravālāḥ
GK19uddkokpu:176_1: kamrā vallyaḥ kimapi marutā cumbitā dakṣiṇena
GK19uddkokpu:177_0: kiñciddaṣṭādharakisalayāṃ prāṅmayā bhogakāle sītkurvāṇāṃ dhutakaratalāṃ tvāṃ priye smārayanti aṃsālambiślathakacabharaṃ hastaruddhāmbarāntaṃ
GK19uddkokpu:178: smāraṃ smāraṃ kathamapi mayā muhyatā sahyate 'sau mando vāyuḥ sutanu
GK19uddkokpu:180: tīrtvā rātriṃ virahamahatīṃ tīvratāpāṃ kathañcid dṛṣṭvā bhānoḥ kiraṇamaruṇaṃ jambhaśatrordigante
GK19uddkokpu:181_0: pratyudyāntīṃ tvaritamabalāṃ śliṣyate bhāgyasīmne sāraṅgākṣi spṛhayati mano hanta cakrākhyayūne utkaṇṭho 'smi tvaduditadhiyā
GK19uddkokpu:181_1: mugdhahaṃsīnināde tvadbhūṣāyāṃ hariti satataṃ locane pātayāmi
GK19uddkokpu:182_0: tvatsaṃspṛṣṭe mama ca vapuṣi prema badhnāmi kānte satyaṃ prāṇānapi paramahaṃ tvatpriyān dhārayāmi tvaṃ cāhaṃ ca kṣitimupagatāvityaviśleṣacintā
GK19uddkokpu:183: spṛśyete nau niśi śaśikarairaṅgake yaugapadyāt tenāpyasti dviradagamane satyamāśleṣabuddhiḥ hāhantāsminnasulabhamithodarśane viprayoge saivālambo mama bhagavatī bhāvanākalpavallī /
GK19uddkokpu:184: tvāmāsīnāmasakṛdanayā gāḍhamāliṅgya rāgād aṅkārūḍhāmalaghujaghane nocitaṃ vaktumanyat // Kok_2.58
GK19uddkokpu:185: jātaṃ ceto madanasubhaṭasyādya yogyaṃ śaravyaṃ naikacchidraṃ niyatamamutaḥ subhru vibhraṃśi dhairyam /
GK19uddkokpu:186_0: kālāt kṣīṇe punaravayave vardhate kevalaṃ no tāpastīvrasmarahutabhujā tasya varṇodgamo 'pi evaṃprāyā na hi na virahe jīvituṃ
GK19uddkokpu:186_1: santyupāyāḥ satyaṃ taistaiḥ kṛtadhṛtirahaṃ prāṇimi prāṇanāthe
GK19uddkokpu:187_0: niścityaivaṃ nirupamaguṇe sāhasebhyo nivṛttā tvaṃ ca snānādiṣu savayasāṃ prārthanāṃ mā niṣedhīḥ tīrṇaprāyo virahajaladhiḥ
GK19uddkokpu:187_1: śailakanyāprasādāc cheṣaṃ māsadvitayamabale sahyatāṃ mā viṣīda /
GK19uddkokpu:188_0: dhūpodgāraiḥ surabhiṣu tato bhīru saudhāntareṣu krīḍiṣyāvo navajaladharadhvānamandrāṇyahāni kacciccitte sphurati capalāpāṅgi
GK19uddkokpu:189: snānānte te mukhamupasakhi prekṣamāṇe mayi drāg- vakṣodaghne payasi punarapyāvayormajjanaṃ tat // Kok_2.62 //
GK19uddkokpu:190: āśliṣyantaṃ viṭapabhujayā tatra vallīranekāḥ krīḍārāme kamapi taruṇaṃ vīkṣya mākandavṛkṣam
GK19uddkokpu:191: sācīkṛtya sphuradadharayā caṇḍi vaktraṃ bhavatyā subhrūbhaṅgaḥ sajalakaṇikaḥ preṣito mayyapāṅgaḥ pratyākhyātaḥ praṇayini ruṣā bimbito 'haṃ stane te sairandhryajñā
GK19uddkokpu:193_0: mā pāṭīraṃ pulakini punaścātra limpeti śaṃsaty ālīvṛnde smitajuṣi kṛtā dṛktvayā vrīlagarbhā uccinvatyāḥ kisalayarucā pāṇinodyānapuṣpaṃ
GK19uddkokpu:194_0: reṇutrastā iva sumanasāṃ dakṣiṇāḥ kelisakhyaḥ kañcitkālaṃ karakisalayairapyadhurlocanāni // ityetasmānmama kuśalitāṃ viddhyabhijñānadānād
GK19uddkokpu:195_0: kelīhaṃse smarajuṣi haṭhāccumbatīṣatstanantīṃ tvaṃ tu smṛtvā kimapi bahalavrīlamālokathā mām rāgo nāma truṭati viraheṇeti
GK19uddkokpu:196: so 'yaṃ bhedo viṣayabhidayā saṅgame tvaṃ kilaikā viśleṣe tu tribhuvanamidaṃ jāyate tvanmayaṃ hi // Kok_2.67 //
GK19uddkokpu:197: etatkṛtyaṃ priyasakha mama bhrāturārtasya kṛtvā nāsīraḥ syā jagati karuṇāśālināṃ saṃvibhāge
GK19uddkokpu:198: śaṃsanti tvāṃ nanu parabhṛtaṃ śaiśave yadbhṛto 'nyaiḥ patrivrātābharaṇa bharaṇenādya sa tvaṃ pareṣām // Kok_2.68 //
GK19uddkokpu:199: evaṃ tasyā virahavidhuraṃ jīvitaṃ sthāpayitvā gaccha svecchāviharaṇa yathāprārthitaṃ digvibhāgam
GK19uddkokpu:200: mānyaśrīḥ syānmadananṛpateḥ kokilā te 'nukūlā bhūyānmaivaṃ sakṛdapi tayā
